channel.title: An Error
channel.description:
[code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at client.run(client.java:1362) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
This happens when ever some one logs out. Any one know whats wrong?

item.title: An Error
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

I know its because the server is trying to parse outgoing packets after the connection is lost…
Or at least thats why mine does it…
Anyone have any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: An Error
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

happens to me too, i think its normal but could be wrong.
